ModMetaData.name: House Harkonnen Faction
ModMetaData.author: Zalera
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the brutal and fearsome House Harkonnen from the Dune universe as a new faction in RimWorld.
This mod includes: - A custom House Harkonnen faction with appropriate ideology and behavior - Five unique Harkonnen warrior types, each wearing distinct armor from the Dune: Harkonnen Armor and Weapons mod - Integration with custom weapons and apparel provided by the dependency mod
Requires: "Dune - Harkonnen Armor and Weapons" (Steam ID: 3441453108)
Created for RimWorld 1.6
